tool_description: Validates text chunks against quality rules, size constraints, and content requirements to ensure chunking quality.

chunks.description: Array of text chunks to validate

min_chunk_size.description: Minimum acceptable chunk size in characters

max_chunk_size.description: Maximum acceptable chunk size in characters

check_completeness.description: Whether to check for incomplete sentences or words

error_messages: Empty chunks array: Provide at least one chunk for validation.
Invalid size constraints: Minimum chunk size must be less than maximum chunk size.
Size constraint violation: Some chunks violate the specified size constraints.
Encoding issues detected: Some chunks contain invalid character encodings.
Completeness check failed: Some chunks contain incomplete sentences or truncated words.
usage: Provide chunks array and size constraints, optionally configure validation options and rules. Returns validation results and any issues found.

total_issues.description: Total number of validation issues found

problematic_chunks.description: Indices of chunks that failed validation
